net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy
Interface AdaptiveStrategy

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, MarketEventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, TradingStrategy
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdaptiveStrategyImpl, DiscreteLearnerStrategy, MDPStrategy, StimuliResponseStrategy
public interface AdaptiveStrategy
extends TradingStrategy

Strategies implementing this interface indicate that they are based on a learning algorithm.
